content:
You've been keeping track of your purchases, that's great!

So, let's start with the two purchases you mentioned:

1. March 20th
2. March 15th (Sunday)

Can you think back to any other purchases you might have made before March 15th? Did you make any online purchases in the first two weeks of March or at the end of February?

Also, do you remember what you bought on March 15th during the commercial break? Was it something impulsive or something you had been planning to buy for a while?

Sharing more details can help us get a better understanding of your online shopping habits and identify any patterns or triggers.
